metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23005 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In the Linux kernel before 6.2, mm/memory-tiers.cmisinterprets the alloc_memory_type return value (expects it to be NULL inthe error case, whereas it is actually an error pointer). NOTE: this isdisputed by third parties because there are no realistic cases in which auser can cause the alloc_memory_type error case to be reached.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
